description:
When the Vienna House contacted me earlier and suggested a get- together, I did not hesitate.  The Vienna House will introduce some of the award winning companies from their digital media content award, and the first stop is in Brussels.  The network invited is Mobilemonday Brussels enlarged with other networks like Agoria APP Alliance, Impulse, Sirris, ScreenBrussels,…  but focus is on apps and creativity.

Experience prizewinning games, apps, shorts, characters and visuals made in Vienna. With the goal of promoting innovative digital media content from Vienna beyond the Austrian borders, Content Award goes on tour in 2014. 

The first stop brings Content Award to the EU capital of Brussels Program: Talks by Kris Hoet, Head of Digital andChange Architect Duval Guillaume Tanguy De Lestré, Mobilemonday Brussels Claus Hofer, CEO ZIT Technology Agency of the City of Vienna Showcase of Tagtool, intuitive app for live animation by OMAi

19H Mobilemonday partner event - limited seating Join us at the Vienna House in Brussels for an evening of inspiring talks, networking and a walking dinner.
how_to_find_us: Vienna House Brussels Avenue de Tervueren 58 , 1040 Brussels, Belgium
name: MobileMonday 2014 kick-off at Vienna Content Award on Tour

description:
You are hereby cordially invited to mingle with MobileMonday Founders and Organizers from around the globe.


MobileMonday Belfast, Brussels, Silicon Beach, Silicon Valley, and Tokyo have organized a fun night of drinks tapas and networking with the worlds largest community of mobile developers and entrepreneurs. From Tel Aviv to Tokyo, our industry community leaders will be in attendance. 


We have some exciting announcements to make as well this night.

MWC, Guest Register:  http://bit.ly/mwc2014momoguest
name: Mobilemonday drink (Barcelona)
